title: What is a Housing Hackathon 2024?
body: A hackathon is an innovation contest where participants compete to create the best solution to a given problem. The Housing Hackathon 2024 provides a unique experiential learning experience. It encourages and develops creative thinking, entrepreneurship, and problem-solving skills by bringing together students from diverse backgrounds to work together on addressing real-world challenges. The teams receive support from subject-specific mentors and technical specialists. They then showcase their solutions in a fun and lively environment to be adjudicated by a panel of experts consisting of investors, partners, school representatives, and domain specialists.
